txt.en: In your absence, new threats have come to Forochel. Ostasänt, a warrior from Sûri-kylä, seeks assistance in defeating the threats that she has recently encountered.
Ostasänt requires assistance as Forochel is once again under threat.

'I am looking for a warrior. Is that you?\n\n'I have recently returned to Sûri-kylä from a hunting expedition. I saw beasts of such evil. Forochel does have its share of deadly beasts, but these were unlike anything I have seen before. I fear a darkness is coming. I can feel it in the wind. I do not know if I will be able to defend my people if the darkness spreads to my village. I hope that you are able to help me restore peace to Ice-Bay.'
Ostasänt can be found in Sûri-kylä.\n\nYou should speak with Ostasänt.
Ostasänt can be found in Sûri-kylä.\n\nYou should speak with Ostasänt.
